blogPost.title: How do I turn a personal passion into a social outlet and have longevity? Answer by @lawrencekosick, president and co-founder of @GetSetUp_org. https://t.co/5nB2nnRRmn https://t.co/M3afJXekLa
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 個人的な情熱を社会的な活動に転化し、長続きさせるには？Answer by @lawrencekosick, president and co-founder of @GetSetUp_org. https://t.co/5nB2nnRRmn https://t.co/M3afJXekLa
